Body:
s = socket.socket()
host = socket.gethostname()
port = dataPort
result = 0
while result == 0:
    try:
        sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
        result = 1
        result = sock.connect_ex((host, port))
    except IOError as e:
        logger.warning(e)
logger.info('Started server on {0}:{1}'.format(host, port))
s.bind((host, port))
return s
